Articles.Content:
Dear Modders,

Could anyone make the stock angled nosecone into a radial decoupler like those of popular parts packs?

-Duxwing

> 
> This what you want ? Just need ModuleManager \*.\*.\* which you should have and put the file anywhere in the KSP/GameData folder 
> 
> 
> 
>     @PART[pointyNoseConeB]{  fx_gasBurst_white = -1.16832, 0.0, -0.0826454, -1.0, 0.0, 0.0, decouple   sound_vent_large = decouple  stagingIcon = DECOUPLER_HOR  stageOffset = 1  childStageOffset = 1  MODULE  {   name = ModuleAnchoredDecoupler   anchorName = anchor   ejectionForce = 250   explosiveNodeID = srf  }}
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Nosecone_Decoupler_Patch.cfg.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Nosecone_Decoupler_Patch.cfg.zip)

Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-Duxwing
